article_title: 26 Fall Movies To Draw You Back to the Big Screen
article_text:
For Those Who Miss Their (TV) Family

This Is Where I Leave You (September 19)

Tina Fey, Jason Bateman, Adam Driver and Connie Britton are all people we associate with high-end, brainy and snarky TV entertainment, which is why it’s so disconcerting to see them all starring in what looks to be a fairly bland family dramedy. Based on a somewhat popular novel by Jonathan Tropper, there is still some hope that the film is better than the trailers.
